summary: This document is a New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services (DCJS) criminal history repository inquiry result for an individual with a specific NYSID number. It indicates no criminal history found in New York State records for the subject, but includes a caution that identification is not fingerprint-based and that the FBI may have separate records.
locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: A criminal history inquiry was conducted on December 12, 2021, for an individual with NYSID number 'Man 12112%2021' (or similar).
The inquiry found no criminal history or releasable criminal history information associated with this NYSID in New York State records.
The document includes a caution that the identification is not based on fingerprint comparison and the record was produced from an inquiry.
It warns that the FBI may have a record for the individual despite the NYS result, and a direct request to the FBI is needed for that information.
The document is marked for a specific use case (Case No: S0D-NY-3027571) and must be destroyed after use per federal law (Title 42 USC 3789g(b)).
